1370: Lammekin moved to Den Hof.C.7 after marriage.
Got married to Jacomin at age 18 in 1370.
1371: Had a daughter with Jacomin, Natelien, at age 19.
1373: Had a daughter with Jacomin, Machtilden, at age 21.
1375: Had a son with Jacomin, Lutbrandus, at age 23.
Lost daughter Machtilden when Machtilden was 3 years old.
1377: Had a daughter with Jacomin, Baua, at age 25.
1378: Had a son with Jacomin, Hubrecht, at age 26.
1379: Lost son Ghisele when Ghisele was 0 years old.
Jacomin gave birth to their stillborn son Ghisele in 1379.
1381: Had a daughter with Jacomin, Alene, at age 29.
1382: Had a son with Jacomin, Raso, at age 30.
Lost son Raso when Raso was 1 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1383: Had a son with Jacomin, Willekine, at age 31.
1387: Lost son Lutbrandus when Lutbrandus was 13 years old.
